cont.entity_a: Purchased for $450 and impressed with the value.
cont.entity_b: Great value for the price paid.

cont.entity_a: The camera has a solid body and ruggedness. Built like a tank with weather sealing and built-in hand grip.
cont.entity_b: Ridiculously strong and reliable with a workhorse build. Heavy but reliable for long-term use.

cont.entity_a: Offers 8fps and superior build quality compared to Canon Rebel series. Pro autofocus with 45 points and 8.3 FPS. High ISO photos at 1600 are usable.
cont.entity_b: Nikon D2xs works flawlessly and performs well for an older pro body. Focuses faster than manual with audio focus.

cont.entity_a: 4.2MP resolution is low, but interpolation can be used for larger images.
cont.entity_b: Sharp 16x24 prints achievable with a good lens.

cont.entity_a: Newer EF-S lenses are incompatible, but others work fine.
Excellent for general and close-up photography.
cont.entity_b: Considered the best camera owned by a professional photographer.

cont.entity_a: Selling used for $2000 is overpriced considering newer models offer better value.
cont.entity_b: Limited compared to newer models like D300, D700, and D3s. Amazon's new price of $5,800 is high; better deals available on eBay.

cont.entity_a: Error 99 issue and difficulty finding accessories.

cont.entity_b: Arrived on time and in perfect condition.
Serves well as a backup system.
